name: Sethi and the Inca Wizard
storyline:
Sethi and the Inca Wizard is the second adventure of Sethi, after he visited Egypt.

la Qoyä, the wife of the emperor is dying from a strange curse. This is no surprise you will help. As Sethi, and with your companion Pepi, you decide to investigate to defeat the enemies of the Empire. You will have to explore places such as Cuzco, Lake Titicaca, the Mountain of the Spirits, the Temple of the Sun, and so on, talk to people, find and use items. Since this game is educational, you will learn about the culture of the Incas.

Sethi and the Inca Wizard is for children from age 6.
